item.title: Jupyter Notebook
item.description:
What is it?

Jupyter Notebook is an open-source web application that allows you to create and share documents containing live code, equations, visualizations, and narrative text.

Why I like it

Jupyter Notebooks provide an interactive environment for exploratory data analysis, making it easy to iterate quickly and visualize results as you go.

Use cases

  • Data cleaning and transformation
  • Statistical modeling and machine learning
  • Creating visualizations
  • Documenting analysis workflows

Getting started
